short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance prompts and access GPT-4 without leaving your keyboard!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you hate having to keep open another tab and constantly switching when you only want to quickly as GPT-4 a question? This extension allows you to ask GPT-4 and enhance prompt without leaving your keyboard!

Simply type \\ask into a textbox to bring up the chatbot, or highlight and press Command+shift+K (Mac) or Ctrl+shift+K (Windows) to enhance a prompt.
